title: 3 bipartisan bills aiming to regulate AI hit Congress this week: Here's what we know
description: Two bills in the Senate and one in the House were introduced to further regulate AI and ensure the US remains at the forefront of the technology.

title: Tesla's EV charging model effectively becomes US standard after GM, Ford deal
description: The deal was initially made between Ford and Tesla -- now GM is joining in.

title: People can't seem to quit Netflix after all
description: Netflix's password crackdown had a very unexpected result.

title: Microsoft commits to supporting customers on their responsible AI journeys
description: As governments urge tighter AI regulations, Microsoft announced three commitments to its partners and customers about its AI development.

title: ChatGPT's hallucination just got OpenAI sued. Here's what happened

title: Spotify is testing a feature that could fix a problem we've all encountered

title: Meta ordered to remove Facebook content under Singapore online safety law
description: The directive to remove a Facebook page containing child sexual exploitation content is the first under a Singapore legislation that kicked in just this year.

title: WhatsApp Channels feature rolls out in these two countries - here's how it works

title: I found the ultimate external SSD - and it can even self-destruct

title: The best wireless security cameras of 2023

title: How to increase the size of your Android keyboard to ease your mobile typing woes

title: How to revoke third-party app access from your Google Account
description: If you've given third-party apps access to your Google Account, you might want to go through the list and revoke permission for those apps you no longer use.
